title: Laptops being borrowed from a school library

content.description: Directions: For the question or incomplete statement below, two of the suggested answers are correct. For this question, you must select both correct choices to earn credit. No partial credit will be earned if only one correct choice is selected. Select the two that are best in each case.
content.question: A school library allows students to borrow laptops. A computer program is used to count the number of times a particular laptop has been borrowed from the library and the number of times the same laptop has been returned to the library . Which of the following indicate that a particular laptop is not currently borrowed? Select two answers.

choices.label: The difference between and is zero.
The product of and is a positive even number.
The quotient when is divided by is greater than 1.
The sum of and is a positive even number.

content.answer: The difference between and is zero.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Represent algorithmic processes without using a programming language.
